channel.title: Inspiration on MyThinkPond
channel.description: Recent content in Inspiration on MyThinkPond

item.title: 15 year old teen invents device to detect a silent heart attack six hours before it occurs
item.description: This article was compiled from various blog sites that discussed the invention and details of the invention developed by Akash Manoj - a fifteen year old child prodigy over a three to five year period. The objective of this blog article is to describe his achievement and to provide a scientific detail around his invention (which I found lacking in other articles on-line). I felt that by providing the foundation and a road-map on how he devised the solution will encourage others to follow their inner creativity and dreams to achieve their desires and goals.
